item.title: Sharpening the Blades
item.description: *Written following week 12 Intro Goals are the currency of football, and it’s no secret that Sheffield United have severly lacked in this category. With 5 goals through twelve matches, the Blades are a far-cry from where they sat last year at this time. After 12 matches in the previous season, Sheffield United sat in a European position with 13 goals in their account. So why has the club parted ways with their elite company and found themselves at the bottom of the table?
